resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
The wheel-manylinux2014-cp37-amd64 [https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/5342884580?check_suite_focus=true] nightly build is failing because of an error in {{test_array_to_pandas_types_mapper.}}

The test build is using pandas 1.0.5, but the test uses {{{}pd.Float64Dtype{}}}, which is only introduced in a more recent version of Pandas.
fields.summary: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly builds failing due to error in types_mapper
